member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.NodeInputs.InputProcedural.Refresh
member.summary: Causes the connected noodle to be re-rendered

member.name: P:Nodexr.Shared.NodeInputs.NodeInput.AffectsLayout
member.summary: Determines whether a change from this input should trigger a re-render of noodles connected to the parent node.

member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.Nodes.Node.CalculateInputsPos
member.summary: Set the position of each input based on the position of the node.

member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.Nodes.Node.GetInputsRecursive
member.summary: Get all of the inputs to the node, including the 'previous' input and the sub-inputs of any InputCollections. InputCollections themselves are not returned.

member.summary: Creates an OrNode with the given nodes as inputs.

member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.NodeTypes.OrNode.#ctor(Nodexr.Shared.Nodes.INodeOutput[])
member.summary: Creates an OrNode with the given nodes as inputs. This overload is to allow easy instantiation with params.

member.name: P:Nodexr.Shared.RegexParsers.GroupParser.ParseGroup
member.summary: Parse any type of group. This includes anything in (non-escaped) parentheses.

member.name: P:Nodexr.Shared.Services.NodeHandler.Tree
member.summary: The NodeTree containing the collection of nodes in the current expression.

member.name: E:Nodexr.Shared.Services.NodeHandler.OutputChanged
member.summary: Called when the output of the node graph has changed.

member.name: E:Nodexr.Shared.Services.NodeHandler.OnRequireNoodleRefresh
member.summary: Called when the state of the noodles has changed, but the noodles have not been re-rendered automatically.

member.name: E:Nodexr.Shared.Services.NodeHandler.OnRequireNodeGraphRefresh
member.summary: Called when the state of the node graph has changed, but the node graph has not been re-rendered automatically.

member.name: M:Nodexr.Shared.Services.NodeHandler.TryCreateTreeFromRegex(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a Regular Expression and creates a node tree from it. The previous Tree is then overwritten by the new one.
member.param: The regular expression to parse, in string format
member.returns: Whether or not the parse attempt succeeded
